testimonials.title: Loved by Creators
testimonials.subtitle: Join thousands of people who've made the switch to the yellow side.

review1.author: Alex Rivera
review1.content: "BananaEdit is literally the fastest editor I've ever used. The background removal is like magic. Pure banana bliss!"

review2.author: Sarah Chen
review2.content: "I used to spend hours in Photoshop. Now I just drop my product shots into BananaEdit and they're ready for my store in seconds."

review3.author: Marcus Thorne
review3.content: "The interface is so clean. No clutter, just the tools you need. It's the only editor that doesn't make me want to pull my hair out."

faq.title: Got Questions?
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about the world's freshest editor.
faq.q1: Is BananaEdit really free to use?
faq.a1: Yes! BananaEdit offers a generous free tier that includes all essential editing tools. We also have a 'Premium Bunch' plan for heavy users who need batch processing.
faq.q2: What file formats do you support?
faq.a2: We support all major web formats including PNG, JPG, WebP, SVG, and even raw banana-vision files (just kidding, but we're working on it).
faq.q3: How does the AI background removal work?
faq.a3: Our proprietary AI algorithm identifies subjects with surgical precision, peeling away backgrounds cleaner than a ripe Cavendish banana.
faq.a4: Absolutely. We don't store your images unless you choose to save them to our cloud. Everything else is processed securely and deleted immediately after your session.
